verses.verse: וּמַֽלְכַּת־ <WH4436> And when the queen שְׁבָ֗א <WH7614> of Sheba שָֽׁמְעָה֮ <WH8085> heard אֶת־ <WH854> for שֵׁ֣מַע <WH8088> of the fame שְׁלֹמֹה֒ <WH8010> of Solomon וַתָּב֣וֹא <WH935> she came לְנַסּוֹת֩ <WH5254> to prove אֶת־ <WH853> שְׁלֹמֹ֨ה <WH8010> Solomon בְחִיד֜וֹת <WH2420> with hard questions בִּירֽוּשָׁלִַ֗ם <WH3389> at Jerusalem בְּחַ֣יִל <WH2428> company כָּבֵ֣ד <WH3515> great מְאֹ֡ד <WH3966> with a very וּ֠גְמַלִּים <WH1581> and camels נֹשְׂאִ֨ים <WH5375> that bare בְּשָׂמִ֧ים <WH1314> spices וְזָהָ֛ב <WH2091> and gold לָרֹ֖ב <WH7230> in abundance וְאֶ֣בֶן <WH68> stones יְקָרָ֑ה <WH3368> and precious וַתָּבוֹא֙ <WH935> and when she was come אֶל־ <WH413> to שְׁלֹמֹ֔ה <WH8010> to Solomon וַתְּדַבֵּ֣ר <WH1696> she communed עִמּ֔וֹ <WH5973> with אֵ֛ת <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> after הָיָ֖ה <WH1961> become עִם־ <WH5973> was on לְבָבָֽהּ׃ <WH3824> with him of all that was in her heart

וַיַּגֶּד־ <WH5046> told לָ֥הּ שְׁלֹמֹ֖ה <WH8010> And Solomon אֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all דְּבָרֶ֑יהָ <WH1697> her all her questions וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> not נֶעְלַ֤ם <WH5956> and there was nothing hid דָּבָר֙ <WH1697> her questions מִשְּׁלֹמֹ֔ה <WH8010> from Solomon אֲשֶׁ֧ר <WH834> which לֹ֦א <WH3808> did not הִגִּ֖יד <WH5046> which he told לָֽהּ׃

וַתֵּ֙רֶא֙ <WH7200> had seen מַֽלְכַּת־ <WH4436> And when the queen שְׁבָ֔א <WH7614> of Sheba אֵ֖ת <WH853> חָכְמַ֣ת <WH2451> the wisdom שְׁלֹמֹ֑ה <WH8010> of Solomon וְהַבַּ֖יִת <WH1004> and the house אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which בָּנָֽה׃ <WH1129> that he had built

וּמַאֲכַ֣ל <WH3978> And the meat שֻׁלְחָנ֡וֹ <WH7979> of his table וּמוֹשַׁ֣ב <WH4186> and the sitting עֲבָדָיו֩ <WH5650> of his servants וּמַעֲמַ֨ד <WH4612> and the attendance מְשָׁרְתָ֜יו <WH8334> of his ministers וּמַלְבּֽוּשֵׁיהֶ֗ם <WH4403> and their apparel וּמַשְׁקָיו֙ <WH4945> his cupbearers וּמַלְבּ֣וּשֵׁיהֶ֔ם <WH4403> also and their apparel וַעֲלִיָּת֔וֹ <WH5930> and his stairway אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which יַעֲלֶ֖ה <WH5927> by which he went up בֵּ֣ית <WH1004> into the house יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> of the LORD וְלֹא־ <WH3808> not הָ֥יָה <WH1961> become ע֛וֹד <WH5750> again בָּ֖הּ רֽוּחַ׃ <WH7307> there was no more spirit

וַתֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <WH559> And she said אֶל־ <WH413> to הַמֶּ֔לֶךְ <WH4428> to the king אֱמֶת֙ <WH571> [It was] a true הַדָּבָ֔ר <WH1697> report אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which שָׁמַ֖עְתִּי <WH8085> which I heard בְּאַרְצִ֑י <WH776> in mine own land עַל־ <WH5921> about דְּבָרֶ֖יךָ <WH1697> of thine acts וְעַל־ <WH5921> about חָכְמָתֶֽךָ׃ <WH2451> and of thy wisdom

וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> did not הֶאֱמַ֣נְתִּי <WH539> Howbeit I believed לְדִבְרֵיהֶ֗ם <WH1697> not their words עַ֤ד <WH5704> against אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> I בָּ֙אתִי֙ <WH935> until I came וַתִּרְאֶ֣ינָה <WH7200> had seen עֵינַ֔י <WH5869> and mine eyes וְהִנֵּה֙ <WH2009> and behold לֹ֣א <WH3808> was not הֻגַּד־ <WH5046> was not told לִ֔י חֲצִ֖י <WH2677> [it] and behold the one half מַרְבִּ֣ית <WH4768> of the greatness חָכְמָתֶ֑ךָ <WH2451> of thy wisdom יָסַ֕פְתָּ <WH3254> me [for] thou exceedest עַל־ <WH5921> and הַשְּׁמוּעָ֖ה <WH8052> the fame אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> i שָׁמָֽעְתִּי׃ <WH8085> that I heard

אַשְׁרֵ֣י <WH835> Happy אֲנָשֶׁ֔יךָ <WH376> are your men וְאַשְׁרֵ֖י <WH835> and happy עֲבָדֶ֣יךָ <WH5650> [are] these thy servants אֵ֑לֶּה <WH428> are these הָעֹמְדִ֤ים <WH5975> which stand לְפָנֶ֙יךָ֙ <WH6440> before תָּמִ֔יד <WH8548> continually וְשֹׁמְעִ֖ים <WH8085> thee and hear אֶת־ <WH853> חָכְמָתֶֽךָ׃ <WH2451> thy wisdom

יְהִ֨י <WH1961> become יְהוָ֤ה <WH3069> God אֱלֹהֶ֙יךָ֙ <WH430> thy God בָּר֔וּךְ <WH1288> Blessed אֲשֶׁ֣ר ׀ <WH834> who חָפֵ֣ץ <WH2654> which delighted בְּךָ֗ לְתִתְּךָ֤ <WH5414> in thee to set עַל־ <WH5921> over כִּסְאוֹ֙ <WH3678> thee on his throne לְמֶ֔לֶךְ <WH4428> [to be] king לַיהוָ֖ה <WH3069> God אֱלֹהֶ֑יךָ <WH430> thy God בְּאַהֲבַ֨ת <WH160> loved אֱלֹהֶ֤יךָ <WH430> because thy God אֶת־ <WH853> יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <WH3478> Israel לְהַעֲמִיד֣וֹ <WH5975> to establish לְעוֹלָ֔ם <WH5769> them for ever וַיִּתֶּנְךָ֤ <WH5414> therefore made עֲלֵיהֶם֙ <WH5921> over לְמֶ֔לֶךְ <WH4428> he thee king לַעֲשׂ֖וֹת <WH6213> over them to do מִשְׁפָּ֥ט <WH4941> judgment וּצְדָקָֽה׃ <WH6666> and justice

וַתִּתֵּ֨ן <WH5414> And she gave לַמֶּ֜לֶךְ <WH4428> the king מֵאָ֥ה <WH3967> an hundred וְעֶשְׂרִ֣ים ׀ <WH6242> and twenty כִּכַּ֣ר <WH3603> talents זָהָ֗ב <WH2091> of gold וּבְשָׂמִ֛ים <WH1314> and of spices לָרֹ֥ב <WH7230> abundance מְאֹ֖ד <WH3966> great וְאֶ֣בֶן <WH68> stones יְקָרָ֑ה <WH3368> and precious וְלֹ֤א <WH3808> never הָיָה֙ <WH1961> had כַּבֹּ֣שֶׂם <WH1314> neither was there any such spice הַה֔וּא <WH1931> that אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which נָתְנָ֥ה <WH5414> gave מַֽלְכַּת־ <WH4436> as the queen שְׁבָ֖א <WH7614> of Sheba לַמֶּ֥לֶךְ <WH4428> king שְׁלֹמֹֽה׃ <WH8010> Solomon

וְגַם־ <WH1571> also עַבְדֵ֤י <WH5650> And the servants [חִירָם כ] (חוּרָם֙ <WH2438> Hiram ק) וְעַבְדֵ֣י <WH5650> and the servants שְׁלֹמֹ֔ה <WH8010> of Solomon אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> who הֵבִ֥יאוּ <WH935> which brought זָהָ֖ב <WH2091> gold מֵאוֹפִ֑יר <WH211> from Ophir הֵבִ֛יאוּ <WH935> brought עֲצֵ֥י <WH6086> trees אַלְגּוּמִּ֖ים <WH418> algum וְאֶ֥בֶן <WH68> stones יְקָרָֽה׃ <WH3368> and precious

וַיַּ֣עַשׂ <WH6213> made הַ֠מֶּלֶךְ <WH4428> And the king אֶת־ <WH853> עֲצֵ֨י <WH6086> trees הָֽאַלְגּוּמִּ֜ים <WH418> [of] the algum מְסִלּ֤וֹת <WH4546> terraces לְבֵית־ <WH1004> to the house יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> of the LORD וּלְבֵ֣ית <WH1004> palace הַמֶּ֔לֶךְ <WH4428> and to the king's וְכִנֹּר֥וֹת <WH3658> and harps וּנְבָלִ֖ים <WH5035> and psalteries לַשָּׁרִ֑ים <WH7891> for singers וְלֹא־ <WH3808> and none נִרְא֥וּ <WH7200> seen כָהֵ֛ם <WH1992> and there were none such לְפָנִ֖ים <WH6440> before בְּאֶ֥רֶץ <WH776> in the land יְהוּדָֽה׃ <WH3063> of Judah

וְהַמֶּ֨לֶךְ <WH4428> And king שְׁלֹמֹ֜ה <WH8010> Solomon נָתַ֣ן <WH5414> gave לְמַֽלְכַּת־ <WH4436> to the queen שְׁבָ֗א <WH7614> of Sheba אֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all חֶפְצָהּ֙ <WH2656> all her desire אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which שָׁאָ֔לָה <WH7592> whatsoever she asked מִלְּבַ֖ד <WH905> alone אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> what הֵבִ֣יאָה <WH935> beside [that] which she had brought אֶל־ <WH413> to הַמֶּ֑לֶךְ <WH4428> unto the king וַֽתַּהֲפֹ֛ךְ <WH2015> So she turned וַתֵּ֥לֶךְ <WH1980> and went לְאַרְצָ֖הּ <WH776> to her own land הִ֥יא <WH1931> he וַעֲבָדֶֽיהָ׃ <WH5650> she and her servants פ

וַיְהִי֙ <WH1961> become מִשְׁקַ֣ל <WH4948> Now the weight הַזָּהָ֔ב <WH2091> of gold אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> that בָּ֥א <WH935> that came לִשְׁלֹמֹ֖ה <WH8010> to Solomon בְּשָׁנָ֣ה <WH8141> year אֶחָ֑ת <WH259> in one שֵׁ֥שׁ <WH8337> was six מֵא֛וֹת <WH3967> hundred וְשִׁשִּׁ֥ים <WH8346> and threescore וָשֵׁ֖שׁ <WH8337> and six כִּכְּרֵ֥י <WH3603> talents זָהָֽב׃ <WH2091> of gold

לְבַ֞ד <WH905> alone מֵאַנְשֵׁ֧י <WH376> he הַתָּרִ֛ים <WH8446> Tokahath וְהַסֹּחֲרִ֖ים <WH5503> and merchants מְבִיאִ֑ים <WH935> brought וְכָל־ <WH3605> and all מַלְכֵ֤י <WH4428> And all the kings עֲרַב֙ <WH6152> of Arabia וּפַח֣וֹת <WH6346> and governors הָאָ֔רֶץ <WH776> of the country מְבִיאִ֛ים <WH935> brought זָהָ֥ב <WH2091> gold וָכֶ֖סֶף <WH3701> and silver לִשְׁלֹמֹֽה׃ <WH8010> to Solomon

וַיַּ֨עַשׂ <WH6213> made הַמֶּ֧לֶךְ <WH4428> And king שְׁלֹמֹ֛ה <WH8010> Solomon מָאתַ֥יִם <WH3967> two hundred צִנָּ֖ה <WH6793> targets זָהָ֣ב <WH2091> gold שָׁח֑וּט <WH7820> [of] beaten שֵׁ֤שׁ <WH8337> six מֵאוֹת֙ <WH3967> hundred זָהָ֣ב <WH2091> gold שָׁח֔וּט <WH7820> [shekels] of beaten יַעֲלֶ֖ה <WH5927> went עַל־ <WH5921> and הַצִּנָּ֥ה <WH6793> target הָאֶחָֽת׃ <WH259> to one

וּשְׁלֹשׁ־ <WH7969> And three מֵא֤וֹת <WH3967> hundred מָֽגִנִּים֙ <WH4043> shields זָהָ֣ב <WH2091> gold שָׁח֔וּט <WH7820> [made he of] beaten שְׁלֹ֤שׁ <WH7969> three מֵאוֹת֙ <WH3967> hundred זָהָ֔ב <WH2091> [shekels] of gold יַעֲלֶ֖ה <WH5927> went עַל־ <WH5921> and הַמָּגֵ֣ן <WH4043> shield הָאֶחָ֑ת <WH259> to one וַיִּתְּנֵ֣ם <WH5414> put הַמֶּ֔לֶךְ <WH4428> And the king בְּבֵ֖ית <WH1004> them in the house יַ֥עַר <WH3293> of the forest הַלְּבָנֽוֹן׃ <WH3844> of Lebanon פ

וְשֵׁ֣שׁ <WH8337> And [there were] six מַעֲל֣וֹת <WH4609> steps לַ֠כִּסֵּא <WH3678> to the throne וְכֶ֨בֶשׁ <WH3534> with a footstool בַּזָּהָ֤ב <WH2091> of gold לַכִּסֵּא֙ <WH3678> to the throne מָאֳחָזִ֔ים <WH270> [which were] fastened וְיָד֛וֹת <WH3027> and stays מִזֶּ֥ה <WH2088> each וּמִזֶּ֖ה <WH2088> side עַל־ <WH5921> and מְק֣וֹם <WH4725> place הַשָּׁ֑בֶת <WH3427> on each side of the sitting וּשְׁנַ֣יִם <WH8147> and two אֲרָי֔וֹת <WH738> lions עֹמְדִ֖ים <WH5975> standing אֵ֥צֶל <WH681> by הַיָּדֽוֹת׃ <WH3027> the stays

וּשְׁנֵ֧ים <WH8147> both עָשָׂ֣ר <WH6240> ten אֲרָי֗וֹת <WH738> lions עֹמְדִ֥ים <WH5975> stood שָׁ֛ם <WH8033> there עַל־ <WH5921> on שֵׁ֥שׁ <WH8337> there on the one side and on the other upon the six הַֽמַּעֲל֖וֹת <WH4609> steps מִזֶּ֣ה <WH2088> the one וּמִזֶּ֑ה <WH2088> side לֹא־ <WH3808> nothing נַעֲשָׂ֥ה <WH6213> There was not the like made כֵ֖ן <WH3651> like לְכָל־ <WH3605> any מַמְלָכָֽה׃ <WH4467> in any kingdom

וְ֠כֹל <WH3605> All כְּלֵ֞י <WH3627> vessels מַשְׁקֵ֨ה <WH4945> And all the drinking הַמֶּ֤לֶךְ <WH4428> of king שְׁלֹמֹה֙ <WH8010> Solomon זָהָ֔ב <WH2091> [were of] gold וְכֹ֗ל <WH3605> and all כְּלֵ֛י <WH3627> and all the vessels בֵּֽית־ <WH1004> of the house יַ֥עַר <WH3293> of the forest הַלְּבָנ֖וֹן <WH3844> of Lebanon זָהָ֣ב <WH2091> gold סָג֑וּר <WH5462> [were of] pure אֵ֣ין <WH369> else כֶּ֗סֶף <WH3701> none [were of] silver נֶחְשָׁ֛ב <WH2803> thing accounted בִּימֵ֥י <WH3117> of in the days שְׁלֹמֹ֖ה <WH8010> of Solomon לִמְאֽוּמָה׃ <WH3972> it was [not] any

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for אֳנִיּ֤וֹת <WH591> ships לַמֶּ֙לֶךְ֙ <WH4428> For the king's הֹלְכ֣וֹת <WH1980> went תַּרְשִׁ֔ישׁ <WH8659> to Tarshish עִ֖ם <WH5973> with עַבְדֵ֣י <WH5650> with the servants חוּרָ֑ם <WH2361> of Huram אַחַת֩ <WH259> once לְשָׁל֨וֹשׁ <WH7969> every three שָׁנִ֜ים <WH8141> years תָּב֣וֹאנָה ׀ <WH935> came אֳנִיּ֣וֹת <WH591> the ships תַּרְשִׁ֗ישׁ <WH8659> of Tarshish נֹֽשְׂאוֹת֙ <WH5375> bringing זָהָ֣ב <WH2091> gold וָכֶ֔סֶף <WH3701> and silver שֶׁנְהַבִּ֥ים <WH8143> ivory וְקוֹפִ֖ים <WH6971> and apes וְתוּכִּיִּֽים׃ <WH8500> and peacocks פ
